adDetails: Complete expert indoor renovation at a great price-- granite counter, pergo floors, refinish wood floor, custom staircase, fireplace mantel, recessed lighting, crown and base mouldings, bathroom, cabinets, handrails, shelves, painting, etc. To view pics, click here, http://home.comcast.net/~candelariabustos/site/?/photos/, then click on thumbnail photos to enlarge Call Jose Luis for free estimate, NO EMAILS PLEASE show contact info
